SpecialOlympicsKentucky.organization_mission_statement: The mission of Special Olympics is to provide year-round sports training and athletic competition in a variety of Olympic-type sports for children and adults with intellectual disabilities, giving them continuing opportunities to develop physical fitness, demonstrate courage, experience joy and participate in a sharing of gifts, skills and friendship with their families, other Special Olympics athletes and the community.

PlannedParenthood.organization_mission_statement: Planned Parenthood is a trusted health care provider, an informed educator, a passionate advocate, and a global partner helping similar organizations around the world. Planned Parenthood delivers vital reproductive health care, sex education, and information to millions of women, men, and young people worldwide.

TheBreastCancerResearchFoundation.organization_mission_statement: The mission of the Breast Cancer Research Foundation is to prevent and cure breast cancer by funding the most promising medical research worldwide. By investing 91 cents of every dollar to our mission, BCRF stands today as the largest and most highly rated global funder of breast cancer research.

AmericanFoundationForSuicidePrevention.organization_mission_statement: The American Foundation for Suicide Prevention (AFSP) is dedicated to saving lives and bringing hope to those affected by suicide.

TheTrevorProject.organization_mission_statement: The mission of The Trevor Project is to end suicide among gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender and questioning young people.

PalestineChildrensReliefFund.organization_mission_statement: The PCRF provides free medical care to children in the Middle East, regardless of their nationality or religion, who do not have access to the care they need. To accomplish this we operate a wide variety of programs that range from meeting the monthly medical needs of children with chronic conditions, to bringing volunteer surgical teams to the Middle East to perform life-changing and life-saving procedures and train local medical staff to creating the first pediatric cancer department in Palestine.

WorldCentralKitchenInc.organization_mission_statement: Founded in 2010 by Chef José Andrés, World Central Kitchen (WCK) is a nonprofit organization that is first to the frontlines providing fresh meals in response to humanitarian, climate, and community crises. Applying our model of quick action, leveraging local resources, and adapting in real time, WCK has served hundreds of millions of nourishing meals around the world. We know that good food provides not only nourishment, but also comfort and hope, especially in times of crisis. Learn more at wck.org.

WashingtonGorgeActionPrograms.organization_mission_statement: Washington Gorge Action Programs is the Community Action Agency for Klickitat and Skamania Counties. We are a 501(c)3 nonprofit. Our mission is strengthening community by inspiring hope and helping people help themselves. We provide food, utility, and housing help to hundreds of community members each year. We support community-building organizations, too, which you can see on our website. wagap.org

BuildingUpLivesFoundation.organization_mission_statement: We run a food bank and community resource center aimed at assisting the homeless, battered/abused individuals, and those who are in need due to community crises.

BradleyAngle.organization_mission_statement: Bradley Angle's mission is to serve all people affected by domestic violence. We do this by placing people experiencing- or at risk of- domestic violence at the center of our services and providing them with safety, education, empowerment, healing, and hope. We strive to offer inclusive and accessible programs for survivors of diverse backgrounds, cultures, identities, and experiences. We are committed to compassionate care and providing services that recognize survivors' strength and resilience.

Squires.organization_mission_statement: Squires is dedicated to empowering, encouraging, and supporting teen dads to provide long term emotional, physical, and financial support for their child. Our goal is to change the culture of expecting fathers to run away from responsibility.

OperationFreeWomen.organization_mission_statement: We provide abortion cost assistance services to women who live in states where abortions are not legal. We strive to provide the best accountability for our donors and funders. Our policy is that 70% of all proceeds get classified into a restricted cash account, which can only be used for paying for these services. Only 30% of what is received can be used towards business expenses and management and general expense. (Please note we are not 501(c)(3) tax-exempt).

CampVirgilTate.organization_mission_statement: Camp Virgil Tate Provides the Kanawha Valley a venue full of educational opportunities. We make every effort to provide a beautiful outdoor space for fostering youth development through nature based play and learning. By providing a place filled with opportunities, we encourage groups that use our space to enable youth to learn about themselves, foster a sense of empathy, serve others in their community and their world, and grow into productive citizens and tomorrow's leaders.

KidsDreamzKlub.organization_mission_statement: We remodel behavior, improve academic scores, and create opportunities. The children are the future of our communities and our nation. We provide a safe, friendly, and fun child development programs, events and activities. We focus on improving academic performance and creating opportunities for under-served children. Our programs integrate interactive learning strategies, dynamic play techniques that re-enforce personal and interpersonal social skills, and good behavior.

AspirePerformanceAcademyOfTheArts.organization_name: Aspire Performance Academy of the Arts.
AspirePerformanceAcademyOfTheArts.organization_mission_statement: Aspire Performance Academy of the Arts is on a mission to strengthen our community and edify its artists by providing a safe place for growth, professional instruction, challenging curriculum, and quality performance opportunities. Serving any age, any ability.

SmileLiberiaInternationalInc.organization_mission_statement: Bringing smiles to individuals in the poorest communities of Liberia by providing them with quality education.

AdultCareCenterOfRoanokeValleyInc.organization_name: Adult Care Center of Roanoke Valley, Inc.
AdultCareCenterOfRoanokeValleyInc.organization_mission_statement: Adult day care provides supervised care, social interaction, mental stimulation and allows care givers much needed respites and time for work and errands.

AIMAtMelanoma.organization_mission_statement: AIM at Melanoma is globally engaged and locally invested in advancing the battle against melanoma through innovative research, legislative reform, education, and patient and caregiver support.

Washington211.organization_mission_statement: Washington Information Network 211 is the lead agency for 2-1-1 services in the State of Washington. 2-1-1 is an easy-to-remember phone number similar to 9-1-1 that connects people to a wide range of free health and human services. By simply dialing 2-1-1 or accessing www.win211.org, anyone in need can be referred to one or more of the 5,100 community organizations providing over 17,000 services, whether its housing assistance, Veteran's services, senior meals or the location of the nearest food bank.

TreeOfLifeHealthcare.organization_mission_statement: Tree Of Life Healthcare is a non-profit medical and eye clinic in Columbus, Georgia. Our clinic is designed to serve the of patients who have no health insurance and the under-served. Our Mission is to provide compassionate preventive health care through Screenings, Education and Primary Medical Care, to individuals and families.

GiftHealthPlusInc.organization_mission_statement: Gift Health Plus is a New Jersey, USA based organization with a mission to help provide holistic and high quality healthcare to rural communities in Nigeria during our free medical missions. We are committed to helping build sustainable health facilities in rural Nigeria that are equipped to manage most diseases endemic to these communities.

NationalAllianceOnMentalIllness.organization_mission_statement: NAMI National supports, educates, and advocates for individuals with serious mental illness and their families

TheInnocentsGuideInc.organization_mission_statement: To help the innocent prevent or navigate false accusations by providing free educational resources.

PunyaFoundationUS.organization_mission_statement: Punya Foundation was established as a charity in 2010 in Australia with a mission of Justice through Education and Empowerment. It operates on the principle of social justice.

BiologyFortifiedInc.organization_mission_statement: Our mission is to enhance public discussion of biotechnology and other issues in food and agriculture through science-based resources and outreach.

AmericanSocietyForThePreventionOfCruelty.organization_name: American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (ASPCA)
AmericanSocietyForThePreventionOfCruelty.organization_mission_statement: The mission of the ASPCA, as stated by Henry Bergh in 1866, is ‘to provide effective means for the prevention of cruelty to animals throughout the United States.’

WorldWildlifeFund.organization_mission_statement: Our mission is to conserve nature and reduce the most pressing threats to the diversity of life on Earth.

TheHumaneSociety.organization_name: Humane Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (The Humane Society)
TheHumaneSociety.organization_mission_statement: The Humane Society's mission is that we fight the big fights to end suffering for all animals.

BestFriendsAnimalSociety.organization_mission_statement: To bring about a time when there are No More Homeless Pets

NationalWildlifeFederation.organization_mission_statement: The mission of the National Wildlife Federation® is to educate, inspire, and assist individuals and organizations of diverse cultures to conserve wildlife and other natural resources and to protect the Earth's environment in order to achieve a peaceful, equitable, and sustainable future.

WorldFoodProgramUSA.organization_mission_statement: To inspire and mobilize people in the United States to support the mission of the U.N. World Food Programme to end hunger.

FeedingAmerica.organization_mission_statement: To feed America's hungry through a nationwide network of member food banks and engage the country in the fight to end hunger

ActionAgainstHungerUSA.organization_mission_statement: To save lives by eliminating hunger through the prevention, detection, and treatment of malnutrition, especially during and after emergency situations of conflict, war, and natural disaster.

TheHungerProject.organization_mission_statement: Our mission is to facilitate individual and collective action to transform the systems of inequity that create hunger and cause it to persist.

BreadForTheWorldInstitute.organization_mission_statement: Our mission is to educate and equip people to advocate for policies and programs that can help end hunger in the U.S. and around the world.

Streetwise.organization_mission_statement: StreetWise exists to elevate marginalized voices and provide opportunities for individuals to earn an income with dignity. Anyone who wants to work has the opportunity to move themselves out of crisis.

TheSalvationArmy.organization_mission_statement: The Salvation Army, an international movement, is an evangelical part of the universal Christian Church. Its message is based on the Bible. Its ministry is motivated by the love of God. Its mission is to preach the gospel of Jesus Christ and to meet human needs in His name without discrimination.

ProjectWeHOPE.organization_mission_statement: Our mission at WeHOPE is to help people become healthy, employed and housed using innovative solutions.

SwordsToPlowshares.organization_mission_statement: War causes wounds and suffering that last beyond the battlefield. Swords to Plowshares’ mission is to heal the wounds of war, to restore dignity, hope, and self-sufficiency to all veterans in need, and to prevent and end homelessness and poverty among veterans.

Project150.organization_mission_statement: Our Mission is to offer free support and services to homeless, displaced, and disadvantaged high school students in the Southern Nevada area so they can remain in school and graduate.

HumanityFirstUSA.organization_mission_statement: Humanity First USA is dedicated to serving humanity and safeguarding human life and human dignity.

TeamRubicon.organization_mission_statement: Team Rubicon serves communities by mobilizing veterans to continue their service, leveraging their skills and experience to help people prepare, respond, and recover from disasters and humanitarian crises.

CaliforniaFireFoundation.organization_mission_statement: We provide emotional and financial assistance to families of fallen firefighters, firefighters and the communities they protect.

SaveTheChildren.organization_mission_statement: The vision of Save the Children is a world in which every child attains the right to survival, protection, development, and participation. Its mission is to inspire breakthroughs in the way the world treats children and to achieve immediate and lasting change in their lives.

AllHandsAndHearts.organization_mission_statement: We support individuals from around the world and serve communities affected by disasters with purpose. Response, recovery, resilience and renewal are why we exist. Respect for the value of diversity, inclusion and social justice drives us forward every day.

MercyCorps.organization_mission_statement: Our mission: to alleviate suffering, poverty, and oppression by helping people build secure, productive, and just communities.

InternationalRescueCommittee.organization_mission_statement: The mission of the IRC is to help people whose lives and livelihoods are shattered by conflict and disaster, including the climate crisis, to survive, recover and gain control over their future.

AmericanRedCross.organization_mission_statement: The American Red Cross prevents and alleviates human suffering in the face of emergencies by mobilizing the power of volunteers and the generosity of donors.

DoctorsWithoutBorders.organization_mission_statement: We provide independent, impartial medical humanitarian assistance to the people who need it most. Doctors Without Borders/Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) cares for people affected by conflict, disease outbreaks, natural and human-made disasters, and exclusion from health care in more than 70 countries.

ActionAidUSA.organization_mission_statement: ActionAid USA is the U.S. branch of ActionAid International, which works in more than 70 countries to achieve social justice, gender equality, and poverty eradication. We influence U.S. policy and international institutions like the United Nations and elevate marginalized voices in the halls of power.
